DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to find out, how far red blood cells reflect age-depended changes in endothelial function.
DOC.brief_title: Red Blood Cells as a Reflection of Endothelial Function in Old Age
DOC.detailed_description: It will be investigated with determination of endothelial function (measured as flow-mediated vasodilation) and of circulated nitric oxid-pool in red blood cells and in blood plasma, how far red blood cells reflect age-depended changes in endothelial function.
